#import library
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import matplotlib
%pylab inline
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.linear_model import LinearRegression, Ridge, Lasso
from sklearn import metrics
source.e1069311:
#heatmap correlation
plt.figure(figsize = (8,6))
sns.heatmap(price.corr(), annot = True, cmap = 'viridis')
plt.title("Pearson Correlation")
plt.show()
source.00fe8ff7:
#handling categorical data
df = pd.get_dummies(price, drop_first = True)
df.head()
source.b3453ea3:
#split data
X = df.drop('price', axis = 1)
y = df['price']
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = train_test_split(X, y, test_size = 0.3, random_state = 0)
print(X_train.shape)
print(y_train.shape)
print(X_test.shape)
print(y_test.shape)
source.f79b5786:
#Linear Regression
lr = LinearRegression()
%time lr.fit(X_train, y_train)
lr.score(X_test, y_test)
source.7b6c649a:
#Ridge Regression
ridge = Ridge(alpha = 0.5)
%time ridge.fit(X_train, y_train)
ridge.score(X_test, y_test)
source.63c9a508:
#Lasso Regression
lasso = Lasso(alpha = 0.5)
%time lasso.fit(X_train, y_train)
lasso.score(X_test, y_test)
source.6f973113:
#check MAE, MSE & RMSE
print('Mean Absolute Error : ', metrics.mean_absolute_error(y_test, y_pred).round(2))
print('Mean Squared Error : ', metrics.mean_squared_error(y_test, y_pred).round(2))
print('Root Mean Squared Error : ', np.sqrt(metrics.mean_absolute_error(y_test, y_pred).round(2)))
source.6fb60d21:
#distribution
plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
sns.distplot(df['price'])
plt.title("Distribution of Price")
plt.show()
source.e9f14a2c:
#transform distribution to normal distribution
figure(figsize = (10,6))
subplot(1,2,1)
hist(df['price'] * 1e-6, 20, color = 'r');
xlabel("Price")
subplot(1, 2, 2)
hist(log10(df['price']),20);
xlabel("log10(Price)")
source.59e20bd6:
#defining feature
coef = pd.Series(ridge.coef_, index = X.columns)

imp_coef = pd.concat([coef.sort_values().head(10),
                     coef.sort_values().tail(10)])
source.7fa9e114:
#visualize feature
plt.figure(figsize = (10,6))
imp_coef.plot(kind = 'barh', color = 'dodgerblue')
plt.title("Feature Importance")
plt.xlabel('Score')
plt.ylabel('Features')
plt.show()
source.646144fb:
#visualize status ~ area
plt.figure(figsize = (8,6))
sns.boxplot(data = price, x = 'status', y = 'area', palette = 'Set1')
plt.title("Status ~ Area")
plt.show()
source.2636d6fd:
#visualize status ~ price
plt.figure(figsize = (8,6))
sns.boxplot(data = price, x = 'status', y = 'price', palette = 'Set2')
plt.title("Status ~ Price")
plt.show()
source.4b9c72f0:
#visualize price ~ area
sns.relplot(data = price, x = 'price', y = 'area', hue = 'status')
plt.title("Price ~ Area")
plt.show()
